problem_data.title: Minimum Size Subarray Sum
problem_data.description: Given an array of positive integers nums and a positive integer target, return the minimal length of a subarray whose sum is greater than or equal to target. If there is no such subarray, return 0 instead.

examples.explanation: The subarray [4,3] has the minimal length under the problem constraint.

  標準輸出: 2
